name: Apart Central
description:
Apart Central,

... the very First Class apartments in the CENTER of Mayrhofen, less than 80 meters from the skilift “Penken” away. 

Preferences: best location – directly next to the ski lift “Penken” and the main shopping street. Modern apartments with a very well equipped interior and with special highlights, such as dinning- billard table system, private saunas in the apartments, patio with waterfalls, apartments on 2 levels with sunny balcony and roof terraces and many other amenities. 
The 380m² holiday house with 8 bedrooms offers a new, private spa area with sauna, infrared cabin, whirlpool and relaxation room with starry sky. It´s just perfect for bigger groups, up to 16 persons. 

Outdoor area: 1000m² garden area with sunbeds, secure children playing area with trampoline and a cozy barbeque area.

Our guests appreciate, among other things, benefits and discounts through our cooperation with more than 50 local businesses.

***Location is Luxury: 80m next to the ski lift***

Another Highlight: Our in-house distillery "Stiefelscherm". Famous for genuine spirits and fruity liqueur products. Produced, entirely from our own natural grown fruits.
INCLUDED: entire running costs, bed linen,towels, towels change, wifi,parking area;

check in: 15.00 or after consulting/ check out: 09.30

Apart Central is located in the centre of Mayrhofen. Follow road B169. Pass the river Ziller and turn left into the Dornaustraße, direction center and Penken - cable car.
new apartments in Mayrhofen, Zillertal, very central, next to the ski lift in the center

itemOffered.description:
Great holiday deal for your short stay in Mayrhofen

The package includes:
* 3 nights in the 135m² penthouse suite Rubin
* entire running costs
* free W-Lan access
* useage of the 1000m² garden area
* garden recliners and useage of the barbeque area
* welcome drink

We are looking forward to your enquiry!
